entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
